snippet: Rockaway Beach in Queens seems to catch its breath after the lifeguards leave, and a new shift arrives to savor the stars, sounds and space.
abstract: Many New Yorkers come to Rockaway Beach after hours to savor the stars, sounds and space of an empty beach (Series: Summer Nights).
lead_paragraph: Rockaway Beach in Queens seems to catch its breath after the lifeguards leave, and a new shift arrives to savor the stars, sounds and space.

headline.seo: After Sunset, Rockaway Is a Whole New Beach
headline.main: After Sunset, a Whole New Beach as Rockaway Gets Its Second Wind
headline.print_headline: After Sunset, a Whole New Beach As Rockaway Gets Its Second Wind
